law.catch_line: A filed record is effective only to the extent that it was filed by a person that may file it under ...

text.section: A filed record is effective only to the extent that it was filed by a person that may file it under § 9-509.
A record authorized by one secured party of record does not affect the financing statement with respect to another secured party of record.
A continuation statement that is not filed within the six-month period prescribed by § 9-515(d) is ineffective.
